column5: The Cypress Suite is on the second floor (art gallery is on the first floor) of a historic german homestead located on Main Street near restaurants, coffee spots, shopping and museums. The quaint and comfortable suite includes a bedroom, a second bedroom with sleeper sofa, and a bathroom with shower. The Cedar Suite has a private entrance and parking is available on Main Street. See our Cedar Room listing to rent the one bedroom accommodation next door on the same balcony.
